extendedInfo.description: Xpense Manager helps you in recording your expenses based on categories. In addition, you can now set the budget for different existing categories/your own categories. Categories will be automatically identified if its expense exceeds its budget. Any of your expenses can be tagged with tax codes/sections which help in filing taxes. Keep track of your expenses whether they are reimbursable or not and cloud integration for your data backup is available in future. Pictures of receipts can be saved along with their expenses. Xpense Manager is the smartest and friendly app at your service. Featuresâ¢	You can add new categories and sub categories which can be edited or removed later. However, you cannot edit or remove a default category in the app.â¢	You can assign a budget to your categories and sub categories every month.â¢	Once your actual expense exceeds the budget, that category will be highlighted.â¢	Apart from the categories and sub categories for tracking expenses, the Xpense manager provides you with an option to tag it with your tax codes/sections. This helps you during filing taxes at the end of the year.â¢	Option to select an expense is reimbursable or not is available.â¢	You can take pictures of the receipt and store it with that particular expense.â¢	Mode of payment can be recorded along with that particular expense. â¢	Cloud integration for your data backup will be available in future.â¢	You can view the expense report for current month or past month or past three months.â¢	Tables and graphs are available under reports to interpret your expense better. â¢	Expense records can be exported into PDF.â¢	Set your password to protect your expense information. You can always remove it in future if you donât require it.

reviews.title: Great except one major flaw
reviews.comment: Sub categories are awesome. Easy to use and customize. Nice graphing.  **** Needs a way to track income ****
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Please add option to import/export from csv or xml
reviews.author: A Google User
